straggle.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if the people in a group straggle somewhere, they go there fairly slowly and with large spaces between them
straggle.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The children were beginning to straggle in from the playground.
Ali straggled behind, carrying the shopping.
straggle.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to move, grow, or spread out untidily in different directions
straggle.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Unpainted wooden buildings straggle along the main road out of town.
